translations.CHATBOT_CONFIGURATION_MISSING: This chatbot has not been configured yet.
translations.ERROR_PROMPT_NOT_IN_JSON_FORMAT: Prompt has to be in JSON format.
translations.CHATBOT_NAME_HELPER: This is the name that users will see when they interact with the chatbot
translations.CHATBOT_PROMPT_HELPER: This is the name that users will see when they interact with the chatbot
translations.CHATBOT_PROMPT_FORMAT_HELPER: To describe the initial situation, create an object at the start of the array with 2 keys: 'role' and 'content'. For the initial description the role must be 'system'. Place your description of the initial situation in the 'content' key. Add interaction examples after that. Add one object per message with the role corresponding to either 'assistant' or 'user'.
translations.CHATBOT_CUE_HELPER: This defines the content of the first message of the chatbot. You can change it to better orient the conversation with the user.
translations.COMMENT_TEXT_TOO_LONG: The comment text can not be longer than {{max_length}} characters
